billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Relates to the conduct of public hearings by the metropolitan transportation authority
summary: Relates to the conduct of public hearings by the metropolitan transportation authority; requires one additional hearing where more than 75 persons are unable to attend a required public hearing due to limited seating capacity.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the conduct of public hearings by the metropolitan transportation authority
